mapper.select: select mpi.* from monitor_public_img mpi left join monitor_device md on mpi.device_id = md.id where md.device_serial = #{deviceSerial} order by mpi.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_public_img (path, status, illegal_type, device_id) values (#{publicImg.path}, #{publicImg.status}, #{publicImg.illegal_type}, (select id from monitor_device where device_serial = #{deviceSerial}))
